message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even more so than its price suggests.
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I understand your budget constraints. Could you consider $12,000?  It's a significantly reduced price for something of this quality.
I appreciate the reduced price, but $12,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Can you consider that?
